definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
lit. to lead the life of a whore but still want a monument put up to one's chastity (idiom)/fig. to have bad intentions but still want a good reputation/to want to have one's cake and eat it too
pinyin: you4 xiang3 dang1 biao3 zi5 you4 xiang3 li4 pai2 fang1
containing_words.word: 又想当婊子又想立牌坊

definition: see 又想當婊子又想立牌坊|又想当婊子又想立牌坊[you4 xiang3 dang1 biao3 zi5 you4 xiang3 li4 pai2 fang1]
pinyin: ji4 yao4 dang1 biao3 zi5 you4 yao4 li4 pai2 fang1
containing_words.word: 既要当婊子又要立牌坊

sentences.english: It's entirely possible that the papers were whored out like that.
sentences.chinese: 这些文件被婊子一样转手是完全可能的。

sentences.english: The jape is on you, Abel, you and your murdering whores.
sentences.chinese: 这次命运用你开玩笑了，你和你的婊子杀手门。

sentences.english: Now all you gotta do is nibble on this little bitch's earlobe.
sentences.chinese: 现在你要做的是轻轻的咬这个小婊子的耳垂。

sentences.english: Sheldon:Ah, gravity, thou are a heartless bitch.
sentences.chinese: 啊，地心引力，汝乃无良之婊子。
你就是个完美的婊子养的。

sentences.english: What are you, like a clich movie bitch?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得自己是谁，一个说书的婊子？

sentences.english: America is typical a whore wanting to pass off as a virgin.
sentences.chinese: 美国是又要做婊子又要立牌坊的那一种。
“你这个婊子养的，”沃尔兹尖叫。

sentences.english: Man, bitches come and go, every nigga pimpin know.
sentences.chinese: 嘿哥们，那些婊子来了，每个黑鬼都知道。

sentences.english: This bitch will answer for this sooner or later.
sentences.chinese: 这个婊子迟早会遭报应的。
那妄自尊大的婊子是谁啊？

sentences.english: Can some one kill that bitch?
sentences.chinese: 有谁能杀了那个婊子吗？

sentences.english: That Harriet is a cold-hearted bitch .
sentences.chinese: 那个哈丽雅特是个心肠冷酷的婊子。

sentences.english: The so-called art education in the University was just like a torii of a whore.
sentences.chinese: 这些所谓地大学艺术教育正象一个婊子的牌坊。

sentences.english: Money is a bitch that never sleeps.
sentences.chinese: 金钱是个永不休眠的婊子，而且是个醋坛子。

sentences.english: That son of a bitch, forget it.

definition: to have no sense of shame/brazen
